body: Accessibility          Vicksburg National Military Park has 16 miles of paved roads open for touring by private and commercial tour vehicles. Visitors with special needs may tour the park on their own with the use of a self-guiding park tour folder, purchase an audio CD tour, access the park's cell phone tour, or hire a licensed battlefield guide. Begin your visit to the park at the Visitor Center located at 3201 Clay Street, Vicksburg, MS.      Physical/Mobility  Deaf/Hearing Loss  Blind/Low Vision  Service Animals
title: Vicksburg National Military Park: Accessibility
